demoCode.s:
<view class="gov-ver">
        <view class="gov-title">垂直向上:</view>
        <view class="gov-content">
            <gov-button-group
                bind:buttonHandle="buttonHandle"
                button-group="{{buttonGroup2}}"
                button-arrange="top"
                gov-button-group="gov-button-group"
                button-position="vertical">
            </gov-button-group>
        </view>
    </view>
    <view class="gov-ver">
        <view class="gov-title">垂直向下:</view>
        <view class="gov-content">
            <gov-button-group
                bind:buttonHandle="buttonHandle"
                button-group="{{buttonGroup2}}"
                button-arrange="bottom"
                gov-button-group="gov-bottom"
                button-position="vertical">
            </gov-button-group>
        </view>
    </view>

attributes.name: buttonPosition
attributes.description: 按钮位置，有上吸顶和下吸底，分别为top、bottom

attributes.name: buttonArrange
attributes.description: 按钮组排列，有水平方向和竖直方向，分别为horizontal、vertical

events.name: buttonHandle
events.description: 事件派发，向父组件传值为操作按钮组中的按钮索引

externalClasses.name: gov-button-group
externalClasses.description: 按钮组的扩展样式类，可通过此class改变按钮组的样式
